physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a Ravenala tree
 named the Travellers\u0027 Tree
 in Singapore. The tall tree is in th center of the photograph
 in the middle of a small clearing. There is a man on the left of the tree. He is wearing a long-sleeved top with a samping around his waist. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a Ravenala tree, named the Travellers' Tree, in Singapore. The tall tree is in th center of the photograph, in the middle of a small clearing. There is a man on the left of the tree. He is wearing a long-sleeved top with a samping around his waist. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
